# Parameter Specification: Drum808

**CRITICAL CONTRACT:** This specification is immutable during implementation. Stage 1 Planning cannot proceed without this file. All subsequent stages reference these exact parameters.

**Generated by:** UI mockup finalization (ui-mockup skill, v2)
**Generated date:** 2025-11-13
**Referenced by:** Stage 3 (Shell), Stage 4 (DSP), Stage 5 (GUI)

## Total Parameter Count

**Total:** 24 parameters (6 drum voices Ã— 4 parameters each)

## Parameter Definitions

### kick_level
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 80.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Kick drum channel (leftmost)
- **DSP Usage:** Controls output level/gain for kick drum voice

### kick_tone
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 50.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Kick drum channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls tonal character/brightness of kick drum

### kick_decay
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 50.0 to 1000.0 ms
- **Default:** 400.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Kick drum channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls envelope decay time for kick drum

### kick_tuning
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** -12.0 to 12.0 st
- **Default:** 0.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Kick drum channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls pitch offset in semitones for kick drum

### lowtom_level
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 75.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Low Tom channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls output level/gain for low tom voice

### lowtom_tone
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 50.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Low Tom channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls tonal character/brightness of low tom

### lowtom_decay
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 50.0 to 1000.0 ms
- **Default:** 300.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Low Tom channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls envelope decay time for low tom

### lowtom_tuning
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** -12.0 to 12.0 st
- **Default:** 0.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Low Tom channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls pitch offset in semitones for low tom

### midtom_level
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 75.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Mid Tom channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls output level/gain for mid tom voice

### midtom_tone
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 50.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Mid Tom channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls tonal character/brightness of mid tom

### midtom_decay
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 50.0 to 1000.0 ms
- **Default:** 250.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Mid Tom channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls envelope decay time for mid tom

### midtom_tuning
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** -12.0 to 12.0 st
- **Default:** 5.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Mid Tom channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls pitch offset in semitones for mid tom

### clap_level
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 70.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Clap channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls output level/gain for clap voice

### clap_tone
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 50.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Clap channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls tonal character/brightness of clap

### clap_snap
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 60.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Clap channel (labeled SNAP instead of DECAY)
- **DSP Usage:** Controls attack sharpness/snap character of clap

### clap_tuning
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** -12.0 to 12.0 st
- **Default:** 0.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Clap channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls pitch offset in semitones for clap

### closedhat_level
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 65.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Closed Hat channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls output level/gain for closed hi-hat voice

### closedhat_tone
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 60.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Closed Hat channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls tonal character/brightness of closed hi-hat

### closedhat_decay
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 20.0 to 200.0 ms
- **Default:** 80.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Closed Hat channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls envelope decay time for closed hi-hat

### closedhat_tuning
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** -12.0 to 12.0 st
- **Default:** 0.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Closed Hat channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls pitch offset in semitones for closed hi-hat

### openhat_level
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 60.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Open Hat channel (rightmost)
- **DSP Usage:** Controls output level/gain for open hi-hat voice

### openhat_tone
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 0.0 to 100.0 %
- **Default:** 60.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Open Hat channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls tonal character/brightness of open hi-hat

### openhat_decay
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** 100.0 to 1000.0 ms
- **Default:** 500.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Open Hat channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls envelope decay time for open hi-hat

### openhat_tuning
- **Type:** Float
- **Range:** -12.0 to 12.0 st
- **Default:** 0.0
- **Skew Factor:** linear
- **UI Control:** Vertical slider, Open Hat channel
- **DSP Usage:** Controls pitch offset in semitones for open hi-hat

## Parameter Groups

**Kick Drum:**
- kick_level
- kick_tone
- kick_decay
- kick_tuning

**Low Tom:**
- lowtom_level
- lowtom_tone
- lowtom_decay
- lowtom_tuning

**Mid Tom:**
- midtom_level
- midtom_tone
- midtom_decay
- midtom_tuning

**Clap:**
- clap_level
- clap_tone
- clap_snap
- clap_tuning

**Closed Hi-Hat:**
- closedhat_level
- closedhat_tone
- closedhat_decay
- closedhat_tuning

**Open Hi-Hat:**
- openhat_level
- openhat_tone
- openhat_decay
- openhat_tuning

## Notes

- Parameters are implemented in EXACT order during Stage 3 (Shell)
- Parameter IDs must remain consistent across all stages
- UI controls implemented from v2 mockup during Stage 5 (GUI)
- All parameters are Float type (no Bool or Choice parameters)
- Consistent 4-parameter structure across all 6 drum voices
- Clap uses "snap" parameter instead of "decay" for attack characteristics
